Title: Flooding: We live in Lekki to compete with our peers, but it’s not worth the stress anymore — Residents
Summary: Flooding has raised fresh concerns over what the future holds for residents of Lekki, Lagos State . Many begin immediate relocation from a city built on sinking sand . The recent flooding that ravaged the Eti-Osa Local Government Area has raised new concerns .

Title: Super Eagles make late squad adjustments as injuries hit World Cup qualifiers
Summary: Nigeria's preparations for the 2026 FIFA World Cup qualifying matches have been disrupted by a series of injuries . Head coach Eric Chelle to revise his squad ahead of this month’s fixtures against Lesotho and the Benin Republic .

Title: Copyright Commission vows sustained anti-piracy drive after Ogun attack
Summary: Copyright Commission vows sustained anti-piracy drive after Ogun attack . The incident occurred on 25th September 2025 at Sabo Market, Sagamu, Nigeria .

Title: French expert urges regular exercise for better heart health
Summary: French Embassy physical health experts have emphasised the importance of maintaining a consistent exercise regimen to promote better cardiovascular health . During the October edition of the ‘Fitness Core’, the expert outlined how regular physical activity can significantly reduce the risk of cardiovascular disease .

Title: Abia leaders task Tinubu on seaport, rail, gas, property demolitions, Kanu’s release
Summary: Leaders from Abia State across political divides urge President Bola Ahmed Tinubu to address critical infrastructure and socio-political issues affecting the South East . The appeal came on Friday, 3rd October 2025, during the commissioning of state projects .

Title: Nigerians ‘shut down’ New York for Independence Day parade
Summary: Parade procession stretched from East 38th Street to East 24th Street along Madison Avenue . The parade procession shut down the busy midtown corridor to traffic .

Title: Boy hospitalised in Thailand after attack by escaped lion
Summary: Boy hospitalised in Thailand after attack by escaped lion . A lion kept at a private home in Thailand got loose and attacked a young boy . The wildlife department said the boy was left in hospital .

Title: Fresh tensions envelop PDP as crisis spills over to A/Ibom, Plateau, C/River, Kebbi
Summary: In the past week, congresses in Akwa Ibom, Plateau, Kebbi, and Cross River have become chessboard squares on which major factions advance their pieces .

Title: I’ve not heard Tinubu complain about challenges he inherited as president – Mohammed
Summary: UN Deputy Secretary-General Amina Mohammed says she has not heard President Bola Tinubu complain about the challenges he inherited from his predecessor . Mohammed made the remarks at an award dinner at Nigeria House in New York to celebrate Nigeria’s 65th independence anniversary .

Title: NDLEA smashes cocaine syndicate behind 6 UK-bound shipments, nabs arrowhead, 5 others
Summary: The National Drug Law Enforcement Agency (NDLEA) has dismantled two major cocaine cartels responsible for six consignments of the narcotic bound for the United Kingdom . In a string of intelligence-led operations spanning three weeks across Lagos and other states, the agency said .
